mapper.sql: select e.emp_id,e.emp_name,e.user_name,e.password,e.sex,e.birthday,e.phone,e.email, e.status,e.delete_flag,e.create_by,e.create_time,e.update_by,e.update_time,e.dept_id,e.role_id, d.dept_name, r.role_name from tbl_emp e join tbl_dept d on e.dept_id=d.dept_id join tbl_role r on e.role_id=r.role_id
